required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Drug-drug Interaction Study Between Fluconazole and Famitinib in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Open-label, Fixed-sequence Study to Evaluate the Effects of Fluconazole on the Pharmacokinetics and Safety of Famitinib in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: An open-label, fixed-sequence, drug-drug interaction study to evaluate the effects of fluconazole on the pharmacokinetics and safety of famitinib in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum observed serum concentration (Cmax) for famitinib
Area under the concentration-time curve from time zero to time t (AUC0-t,) for famitinib
Area under the concentration-time curve extrapolated to infinity (AUC0-∞.) for famitinib (if applicable)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to maximum observed serum concentration (Tmax) for famitinib
Time to elimination half-life (t1/2) for famitinib
Apparent Volume of Distribution (Vz/F) for famitinib
AUC0-∞. for famitinib metabolite SHR116637(if applicable)
The incidence and severity of adverse events/serious adverse events (based on NCI-CTC AE 5.0)

intervention.description: Fluconazole, once daily on Days 12 to 24; Famitinib, once daily on Days 1 and 15
